title: Zyra broken af?
body:
Okay so Multiple times I have played matches. I have ended up playing against quite a few Zyra's lately. Is it me, or does everyone feel that Zyra's Gameplay super unhealthy correctly?
Multiple times have I ran into a match with her where we should have won, but Zyra no matter what role she goes into just ends up carry the match so hard because of her kit being so overwhelming. Like the player was not even good and missed allot of skill shots; but that doesn't stop the bullshit plants from 100% to 0% in matter of seconds.
I feel that the Gameplay rewards the player to much for missing skillshots or those plant's do way to much damage without being empowered by her ult.

replies.body: Low ELO problems. Zyra got nerfed really hard months ago and has never recovered.

Uhh I am pretty sure she can pretty much 1v5 cause those plants have retarded amounts of pressure, CC, and damage.
Like sure let me just poke you from afar with my plants that are not really worth hitting cause 5 gold, and they take 2-3 hits to kill and there's so many of them. But sure lets give the plants the ability to trigger things like {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3285}} with a damn near 1 to 1 ratio on your AP scaling

ELO Problems.

If some bronze wants to pick a fight on top of a dozen seeds, power to them.

> [{quoted}](name=Too Tired ToCare,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6oBA99h,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-13T03:05:53.302+0000)
>
> Uhh I am pretty sure she can pretty much 1v5 cause those plants have retarded amounts of pressure, CC, and damage.

She's in the dumpster. If you lose to her I don't know what to tell you
Play lulu if you hate her plants so much. Her autos oneshot them

If you see her ult, get the fuck out and don't re-engage until her plants are gone, or you can safely oneshot her.
Just like herm-in-stinker their turrets and plants atk speed is so damn fast is makes Aartrox sad {{champion:266}}
